changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_building_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_building_inventory_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_building_inventory_item @item_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE item_id = @item_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Equip_Item_Socket_Infos WHERE item_id = @item_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Accessory_Item_Infos WHERE item_id = @item_id
DELETE FROM dbo.Building_Inventories WHERE item_id = @item_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_building_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_building_inventory_item GO
